title: Big Holiday Deals Are Here! Jump On These Offers Now to Save
description: The biggest shopping day of the year is just around the corner, and steep discounts on home, kitchen, electronics, and other categories are online now.
author: by CNET Paid Content Studio
excerpt: The biggest shopping day of the year is just around the corner, and steep discounts on home, kitchen, electronics, and other categories are online now.
text: Thanksgiving is here, and that means the biggest shopping weekend of the year! Many merchants have already released big savings on kitchen, home, electronics, and other items you may be hunting for as gifts -- or for yourself. Check out amazing deals from our partners below, which will be updated throughout the holiday season.And don't miss CNET's 100 Days of Holiday, our ultimate guide to the holiday season, for more incredible deals and gift guides for everyone on your list.Big holiday deals on home ADT The holidays are almost here, and that means packages arriving on your porch and lots of time away from home. Help secure your home now with the Front Door Protection Package from ADT. The package includes an ADT motion detector, a Google Nest Doorbell, a Yale smart lock and more, and is easy to set up yourself with no long-term contracts. Front Door Protection also gives you access to Trusted Neighbor, a new service from ADT that allows you to give people you trust secure access to your home when you're away via the ADT+ app. Trusted Neighbor automatically disarms the security system and opens a smart lock, giving them temporary access to your home. When the person leaves, it locks the door and re-arms the security system, giving you peace of mind when you're away.Don't leave your home unprotected during the holidays! ADT has been a leader in home security for the past 150 years, and with services like Trusted Neighbor and 24/7 ADT Monitoring, is still imagining the future. Get 60% off the Front Door Protection Package with Trusted Neighbor today.Requires eligible system purchase and pro monitoring plan. Max discounts and other limitations apply. Click here for additional terms and pricing. Dreame Technology's new state-of-the-art robot vacuum, the X40 Ultra, redefines clean living. With powerful suction, a fully automated cleaning station, an antitangle brush and intelligent mapping technology, it has never been easier to keep your home sparkling clean without ever having to get your hands dirty. Tackling your home's most stubborn cleaning challenges is just a few taps away with Dreame's Dreamehome app, which gives you personalized control over the X40 Ultra's many features, including:Extendable and liftable side brushHands-free base stationSmart mop and washboard cleaningMopExtend RoboSwing technology12,000Pa Vormax suctionOmniDirt detection technologyRemovable mop for carpet cleaningPrecision mopping strategy QVC Keep this one on the counter. Enjoy fluffy Belgian waffles with a crisp finish -- every time -- with the Ninja Waffle Maker Pro. The space-saving vertical design is engineered to heat evenly for consistent results, and it's nonstick for easy cleanup. Plus, with five shade settings, everyone in the fam gets the waffle they want. Pass the syrup, please! MyQ From the living room to the kitchen to the busiest doors and your garage, MyQ helps you keep an eye on your home. Get tailored movement notifications guaranteeing you see real-time activity right from your phone. Revolutionize your home monitoring with a camera that doesn't just watch, it acts. Featuring exclusive MyQ Smart Secure technology, these cameras can automatically lock doors and close your garage, notifying you the moment it detects any person during predefined times. Use the exclusive code CNET10 for 10% off your order through Dec 31. Mattress Firm Don't miss Mattress Firm's Black Friday sale! Get a king-sized mattress for the price of a queen, or queen for the price of a twin. Save up to $700, plus get a free adjustable base on select mattresses, up to a $499 value. Best Buy Keep an eye on your home with the Philips Hue Secure wired camera. Offering a clear 1080p picture and automatic night vision, this camera provides live streaming and records when motion is detected, so you’re always in the know. Recordings are accessible in the Hue app’s Security Center for up to 60 days. Privacy is a priority: All video, audio and livestreams are encrypted end-to-end and can only be viewed by you and authorized users. Stay secure and informed with Philips Hue Secure. Big holiday deals on tech Bose / CNET Selected for Oprah's "Favorite Things 2024" list, Ultra Open Earbuds feature a brilliant combination of open-ear design, incredible audio, and all-day comfort. With a cuff-like fit, Ultra Open Earbuds leave your ears open to hear the world around you while OpenAudio technology delivers rich, private sound. Get them now for $50 off their original price of $299. JBL Experience powerful JBL Deep Bass Sound with the Vibe Beam true wireless earbuds, designed for all-day comfort and an immersive listening experience. Enjoy up to 32 hours of playback (eight hours in the earbuds, 24 in the case) and a quick 10-minute charge for two extra hours. Stay in the moment with Smart Ambient features -- TalkThru for quick conversations and Ambient Aware to stay connected to your surroundings. Perfect for workouts or daily adventures, the IP54 water and dust resistance keeps up with your lifestyle. Customize your sound with the JBL Headphones App and take crystal-clear calls with VoiceAware. Ready to elevate your sound? Getty Images/Tharon Green/CNET No Wi-Fi? No problem! Cellular service lines for your smartwatch or tablet are now half-off, or only $5 per month, on Go5G Next plans. Big holiday deals for gamers Dell Outplay your rivals and show them who's boss with an 18-inch gaming laptop featuring 14th-gen Intel Core processors and Nvidia GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics. Play your most demanding games with up to 270 watts total power performance with more headroom to support overclocking without throttling. Eureka Ergomincs Take your comfort to the next level with the Typhon Hybrid chair, perfect for both home office and gaming environments. Experience intelligent lumbar support that cradles your back for unparalleled comfort. Get 24% off the Typhon chair when you buy now -- that’s $130 -- and save an extra 5% on your order with discount code CNET. Big holiday deals on fitness and outdoors Lectric The Lectric XP 3.0 is your gateway to an elevated and powerful adventure. It takes Lectric's award-winning XP 2.0 design to the next level, providing the company's best ride to date. A quieter motor, increased torque, hydraulic brakes, longevity boosters and added suspension are only a few of the many notable upgrades with this epic e-bike design. Best of all, brand-new optimized gearing makes riding at higher speeds smoother than ever before. The XP 3.0 is also compatible with fan-favorite new accessory options, including the Yepp Seat and a Passenger Package that can hold riders up to 150 pounds. Johnson Fitness & Wellness The new Matrix Adjustable Dumbbells DB50 are designed to fit into any space. With a creative nesting design, they replace up to 10 traditional pairs of dumbbells, saving both room and hassle. A simple twist lets you quickly adjust the weight, allowing for smooth transitions between exercises. The length of the dumbbell adjusts based on the weight selected to keep every rep perfectly balanced, while the knurled metal handle offers excellent grip. Bowflex A high-intensity, low-impact home workout. Whisper quiet: Skip the noise of a typical elliptical that can make it hard to hear your virtual trainer or workout playlist. See just how much every move on your Max Trainer matters with a seven-inch color display that keeps track of your heart rate, burn rate, and more. Take it up a notch with 16 resistance levels that deliver an "I-just-kicked-some-butt" feeling in a short amount of time. Big holiday deals on apparel and lifestyle Pair Eyewear Pair Eyewear's mixed material frames will elevate your Gen Z giftee's style. Available in gold with a black base and in silver with crystal clear base, they'll let you take Pair's customizability to the next level and even match your jewelry to your glasses. Designed with ease in mind, they're compatible with any top frames in the same base shape. And now you can get new limited-edition holiday collection toppers. These frames come in Pair's iconic Kirby, Murphy, Wanda, Larkin and Finley styles, combining sleek new metal temples with the same acetate front you already know and love. Your Gen Z giftee is sure to love it. No Bull Get up to 70% off gear, shoes and more during No Bull's Black Friday sale. Save even more on select items with code CYBER5. Bombas Help bring coziness to a loved one this season with Bombas' Holiday Sock Gift Box. You'll be giving them some of the comfiest socks in the history of feet, with cushioned footbeds, blister-fighting tabs and three patterns that will instantly put them in winter mode. And you get to skip the wrapping. Win-win. For every item purchased, Bombas donates an essential clothing item to those in need, with over 150 million products donated and counting. The perfect gift that both feels good and does good this holiday season. AncestryDNA / CNET Surprise your loved ones with a personalized journey into their roots and a deeper understanding of their genetic traits. Uncover the untold stories of your origins and connections to living relatives. AncestryDNA doesn't just tell you which countries your DNA originates from, but can pinpoint specific regions within them. A meaningful gift that's priced just right. See more deals at CNET's 100 Days of Holiday.
html:
Thanksgiving is here, and that means the biggest shopping weekend of the year! Many merchants have already released big savings on kitchen, home, electronics, and other items you may be hunting for as gifts -- or for yourself. Check out amazing deals from our partners below, which will be updated throughout the holiday season.

And don't miss CNET's 100 Days of Holiday, our ultimate guide to the holiday season, for more incredible deals and gift guides for everyone on your list.

Big holiday deals on home

The holidays are almost here, and that means packages arriving on your porch and lots of time away from home. Help secure your home now with the Front Door Protection Package from ADT. The package includes an ADT motion detector, a Google Nest Doorbell, a Yale smart lock and more, and is easy to set up yourself with no long-term contracts. 

Front Door Protection also gives you access to Trusted Neighbor, a new service from ADT that allows you to give people you trust secure access to your home when you're away via the ADT+ app. Trusted Neighbor automatically disarms the security system and opens a smart lock, giving them temporary access to your home. When the person leaves, it locks the door and re-arms the security system, giving you peace of mind when you're away.

Don't leave your home unprotected during the holidays! ADT has been a leader in home security for the past 150 years, and with services like Trusted Neighbor and 24/7 ADT Monitoring, is still imagining the future. Get 60% off the Front Door Protection Package with Trusted Neighbor today.

Requires eligible system purchase and pro monitoring plan. Max discounts and other limitations apply. Click here for additional terms and pricing.

Dreame Technology's new state-of-the-art robot vacuum, the X40 Ultra, redefines clean living. With powerful suction, a fully automated cleaning station, an antitangle brush and intelligent mapping technology, it has never been easier to keep your home sparkling clean without ever having to get your hands dirty. Tackling your home's most stubborn cleaning challenges is just a few taps away with Dreame's Dreamehome app, which gives you personalized control over the X40 Ultra's many features, including:

  • Extendable and liftable side brush
  • Hands-free base station
  • Smart mop and washboard cleaning
  • MopExtend RoboSwing technology
  • 12,000Pa Vormax suction
  • OmniDirt detection technology
  • Removable mop for carpet cleaning
  • Precision mopping strategy

Keep this one on the counter. Enjoy fluffy Belgian waffles with a crisp finish -- every time -- with the Ninja Waffle Maker Pro. The space-saving vertical design is engineered to heat evenly for consistent results, and it's nonstick for easy cleanup. Plus, with five shade settings, everyone in the fam gets the waffle they want. Pass the syrup, please!

From the living room to the kitchen to the busiest doors and your garage, MyQ helps you keep an eye on your home. Get tailored movement notifications guaranteeing you see real-time activity right from your phone. Revolutionize your home monitoring with a camera that doesn't just watch, it acts. Featuring exclusive MyQ Smart Secure technology, these cameras can automatically lock doors and close your garage, notifying you the moment it detects any person during predefined times. Use the exclusive code CNET10 for 10% off your order through Dec 31.

Don't miss Mattress Firm's Black Friday sale! Get a king-sized mattress for the price of a queen, or queen for the price of a twin. Save up to $700, plus get a free adjustable base on select mattresses, up to a $499 value.

Keep an eye on your home with the Philips Hue Secure wired camera. Offering a clear 1080p picture and automatic night vision, this camera provides live streaming and records when motion is detected, so you’re always in the know. Recordings are accessible in the Hue app’s Security Center for up to 60 days. Privacy is a priority: All video, audio and livestreams are encrypted end-to-end and can only be viewed by you and authorized users. Stay secure and informed with Philips Hue Secure.

Big holiday deals on tech

Selected for Oprah's "Favorite Things 2024" list, Ultra Open Earbuds feature a brilliant combination of open-ear design, incredible audio, and all-day comfort. With a cuff-like fit, Ultra Open Earbuds leave your ears open to hear the world around you while OpenAudio technology delivers rich, private sound. Get them now for $50 off their original price of $299.

Experience powerful JBL Deep Bass Sound with the Vibe Beam true wireless earbuds, designed for all-day comfort and an immersive listening experience. Enjoy up to 32 hours of playback (eight hours in the earbuds, 24 in the case) and a quick 10-minute charge for two extra hours. Stay in the moment with Smart Ambient features -- TalkThru for quick conversations and Ambient Aware to stay connected to your surroundings. Perfect for workouts or daily adventures, the IP54 water and dust resistance keeps up with your lifestyle. Customize your sound with the JBL Headphones App and take crystal-clear calls with VoiceAware. Ready to elevate your sound?

No Wi-Fi? No problem! Cellular service lines for your smartwatch or tablet are now half-off, or only $5 per month, on Go5G Next plans.

Big holiday deals for gamers

Outplay your rivals and show them who's boss with an 18-inch gaming laptop featuring 14th-gen Intel Core processors and Nvidia GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics. Play your most demanding games with up to 270 watts total power performance with more headroom to support overclocking without throttling.

Take your comfort to the next level with the Typhon Hybrid chair, perfect for both home office and gaming environments. Experience intelligent lumbar support that cradles your back for unparalleled comfort. Get 24% off the Typhon chair when you buy now -- that’s $130 -- and save an extra 5% on your order with discount code CNET.

Big holiday deals on fitness and outdoors

The Lectric XP 3.0 is your gateway to an elevated and powerful adventure. It takes Lectric's award-winning XP 2.0 design to the next level, providing the company's best ride to date. A quieter motor, increased torque, hydraulic brakes, longevity boosters and added suspension are only a few of the many notable upgrades with this epic e-bike design. Best of all, brand-new optimized gearing makes riding at higher speeds smoother than ever before. The XP 3.0 is also compatible with fan-favorite new accessory options, including the Yepp Seat and a Passenger Package that can hold riders up to 150 pounds.

The new Matrix Adjustable Dumbbells DB50 are designed to fit into any space. With a creative nesting design, they replace up to 10 traditional pairs of dumbbells, saving both room and hassle. A simple twist lets you quickly adjust the weight, allowing for smooth transitions between exercises. The length of the dumbbell adjusts based on the weight selected to keep every rep perfectly balanced, while the knurled metal handle offers excellent grip.

A high-intensity, low-impact home workout. Whisper quiet: Skip the noise of a typical elliptical that can make it hard to hear your virtual trainer or workout playlist. See just how much every move on your Max Trainer matters with a seven-inch color display that keeps track of your heart rate, burn rate, and more. Take it up a notch with 16 resistance levels that deliver an "I-just-kicked-some-butt" feeling in a short amount of time.

Big holiday deals on apparel and lifestyle

Pair Eyewear's mixed material frames will elevate your Gen Z giftee's style. Available in gold with a black base and in silver with crystal clear base, they'll let you take Pair's customizability to the next level and even match your jewelry to your glasses. Designed with ease in mind, they're compatible with any top frames in the same base shape. And now you can get new limited-edition holiday collection toppers. These frames come in Pair's iconic Kirby, Murphy, Wanda, Larkin and Finley styles, combining sleek new metal temples with the same acetate front you already know and love. Your Gen Z giftee is sure to love it.

Get up to 70% off gear, shoes and more during No Bull's Black Friday sale. Save even more on select items with code CYBER5.

Help bring coziness to a loved one this season with Bombas' Holiday Sock Gift Box. You'll be giving them some of the comfiest socks in the history of feet, with cushioned footbeds, blister-fighting tabs and three patterns that will instantly put them in winter mode. And you get to skip the wrapping. Win-win. For every item purchased, Bombas donates an essential clothing item to those in need, with over 150 million products donated and counting. The perfect gift that both feels good and does good this holiday season.

Surprise your loved ones with a personalized journey into their roots and a deeper understanding of their genetic traits. Uncover the untold stories of your origins and connections to living relatives. AncestryDNA doesn't just tell you which countries your DNA originates from, but can pinpoint specific regions within them. A meaningful gift that's priced just right.

See more deals at CNET's 100 Days of Holiday.
